this_title: Video Killed The Radio Star: The Music Videos That Shaped The 80s
introduction: A celA look at how the introduction of music videos in the 1980s affected the industry, with contributions by Bob Geldof, Herbie Hancock, Roger Taylor and Richie Sambora, and directors David Mallet, Russell Mulcahy and Kevin Godley.对80年代重要MV的回顾，访问了几位重要的MV导演，当然还有咱们喜闻乐见的Duran Duran，Spandau Ballet, Bob Geldof ,AC/DC。里面收录的MV包括Bon Jovi, The Boomtown Rats, The Cure, David Bowie, Herbie Handcock等等等等。很多八十年代的新浪潮歌曲~
foreign_title: Video Killed The Radio Star: The Music Videos That Shaped The 80s
